mapper.select: SELECT count(0) FROM SHELL_SETTING SSH WHERE SSH.IS_DELETE = '0'

SELECT SSH.ID id, SSH.SHELL_NAME shellName, SSH.SHELL_DESC shellDesc, SSH.SYSTEM_TYPE systemType, SSH.SYSTEM_VERSION systemVersion, date_format(SSH.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createTime FROM SHELL_SETTING SSH WHERE SSH.IS_DELETE = '0' LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}
mapper.update: UPDATE SHELL_SETTING SSH SET SSH.SHELL_NAME = #{shellName}, SSH.SHELL_DESC = #{shellDesc}, SSH.SYSTEM_TYPE = #{systemType}, SYSTEM_VERSION = #{systemVersion} WHERE SSH.ID = #{id}
